DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study examine level ovarian response pregnancy rate among poor ovarian responder treat novel treatment protocol 150μg corifollitropin alfa follow 300IU hMG short GnRH agonist protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Poor Ovarian Responders With Corifollitropin Alfa Followed hpHMG Short GnRH Agonist Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: Corifollitropin alfa reach maximum concentration ( Cmax ) , 25 45 h injection , time interval significantly short compare treatment rFSH . The investigator hypothesize rapid increase serum FSH concentration may result significantly high exposure small antral follicle constant high level FSH early follicular phase , secure recruitment follicle , also continue growth . In current study investigator examine whether administration corifollitropin follow 300IU hMG short GnRH agonist protocol may result acceptable pregnancy rate poor ovarian responder fulfil `` Bologna criterion ''
DOC.criteria: Patients fulfill `` Bologna criterion '' poor ovarian response At least two follow three feature must present : . Advanced maternal age ( ≥40 year ) risk factor POR ( poor ovarian response ) ; ii . A previous POR ( ≤3 oocytes conventional stimulation protocol ) ; iii . An abnormal ovarian reserve test ( i.e . AFC < 7 follicle AMH < 1.1 ng/ml ) . Two episode POR maximal stimulation sufficient define patient poor responder absence advance maternal age abnormal ORT ( ovarian reserve test ) .
